name: 莊清松
objective: 陣列信號處理之功效，在於利用以空域上一陣列元組成之陣列天線系統，可依據多通路信號特性及設定需求，自動調整系統參數以消除或減低無線通信在空域上所遭遇之干擾及執行空間多樣(Spatial Multiplexing)之功能。因其具備自動干擾消除及偵測信號源方位之能力，其已是未來無線寬頻高速網路通信系統，如WiFi等之主流架構之一。而本課程主要目的在提供相關陣列信處理之基本原理、概念、系統架構及處理準則，可提供有興趣於無線通信之學生建立實際陣列應用概念、系統設計及信號處理技術之基礎。同時課程所使用之分析處理技術亦可應用於其他相類似領域上。
schedule:
Week 1: Sketch of the Course
Overview of the Array Signal Processing
Week 2: Preliminary Background -Vectors and Matrix Algebra
Week 3: Array Sensors for Array Signal processing
Week 4: Principle of Narrowband Array Beamformers
Week 5: Phase Scanned and switched Array Beamformer
Week 6: Optimal Array Beanformer-MVDR
Week 7: Optimal Array Beamformer-MMSE, MSNR and ML
Week 8: Computer Simulation of Optimal Arrat Beamformers
Week 9: Min. Term Exam.
Week 10: Adaptive Array Beamformers
Week 11: Directional of Source Arrivals Estimation Using spatial
Spectrum Estimation
Week 12: Directional of Source Arrivals Estimation Using Subspace
Decompositions
Week 13: Broadband Array Beanformers
Week 14: Practical Considerations on Array Signal processing-
Calibration and Compensation
Week 15: Adaptive Array-Sidelobe Canceller for Radar Systems
Week 16: Adaptive Array for Wireless Communication Systems
Week 17: Adaptive Array for MIMO wireless Systems
Week 18: Final Exam.
scorePolicy:
Homework Assignment (Matlab Simulations)        30%
Min-Term Examination                            30%
Final Report or Examination                     40%
